fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Every night you may chose to keep your target's original role on convert. Up to 3 times.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: While you are alive there can be 1 more convert at night. If the convert failed there will be no cooldown and you can immediately try to convert again.

fields.name: Wincon:
fields.value: Make man pay for their crimes against the natural order.
